name: tsingsun/yii2-messenger
description: messenger for send and broadcast message on yii2 php framework,

suggest.yiisoft/yii2-swiftmailer: the package is used for mail channel
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: is used for http request in gateway
suggest.yiisoft/yii2-queue: you can use this package to work with queue
suggest.yiisoft/yii2-redis: you can use this package to work with queue base on redis
